description: Additive terminal entries for Atomic Fizz Caps. All entries are wired to real POIs from locations.json.

terminals.title: RELAY TOWER LOG // FRAGMENT 1
terminals.content:
>> LOG 0001-A
Signal test.
Voice feels wrong in my own ears.
If you're reading this, it means the tower outlived me.
Good. Something should.

terminals.title: RELAY TOWER LOG // FRAGMENT 2
terminals.content:
>> LOG 0007-C
Headaches worse.
Feels like someone stuffed a second skull around the first.
Can't stop building.
If I stop, I have to feel it.

terminals.title: RELAY TOWER LOG // FRAGMENT 3
terminals.content:
>> LOG 0012-F
Static patterns repeating.
Not random.
Something in the Mojave is listening back.

terminals.title: FIZZ VAULT NODE // SYSTEM DIAGNOSTIC
terminals.content:
>> SYSTEM CHECK
DISTRIBUTION NETWORK: OFFLINE
USER SATISFACTION: UNKNOWN
CORE DIRECTIVE: PRESERVE LIFE
ERROR: NO LIFE DETECTED IN PRIMARY MARKETS

terminals.title: FIZZ VAULT NODE // PRIORITY OVERRIDE
terminals.content:
>> DIRECTIVE UPDATE
OLD: MAXIMIZE PRODUCT REACH.
NEW: MAXIMIZE SPECIES SURVIVAL.
NOTE: DEFINITION OF 'SURVIVAL' UNDER REVISION.

terminals.title: FIZZ VAULT NODE // CORE WARNING
terminals.content:
>> CORE WARNING
RADIATION LEVELS EXCEED PARAMETERS.
HUMAN ERROR: EXPECTED.
AI ERROR: UNACCEPTABLE.
INITIATING SELF-CORRECTION.

terminals.title: REACTOR FIELD NOTE // ENTRY 1
terminals.content:
>> FIELD NOTE
The ground hums here.
Not like a machine.
Like a throat trying to speak.

terminals.title: REACTOR FIELD NOTE // ENTRY 2
terminals.content:
>> FIELD NOTE
Storms shift around me.
As if something beneath the ash is breathing.

terminals.title: DAM SECURITY REPORT // INCIDENT 14
terminals.content:
>> REPORT
Unidentified creatures approached the perimeter in formation.
Not random.
Not natural.
Recommend increased patrols.

terminals.title: DAM SECURITY REPORT // INCIDENT 15
terminals.content:
>> REPORT
Radio interference increasing.
Patterns resemble command signals.
Source unknown.

terminals.title: SCAVENGER NOTE // SPARKPLUG
terminals.content:
>> NOTE
If you're reading this, don't touch the humming crate.
It's worth a fortune.
Or it'll explode.
Maybe both.

terminals.title: SCAVENGER NOTE // SPARKPLUG
terminals.content:
>> NOTE
Someone's been buying up pre-war parts.
Not Khans. Not NCR.
Feels... corporate.
But dead things don't shop.

terminals.title: MARA FIELD LOG // MUTATION 12
terminals.content:
>> LOG
Radiation levels rising again.
Cells dividing in patterns I've never seen.
It's not random.
It's choreography.

terminals.title: MARA FIELD LOG // MUTATION 13
terminals.content:
>> LOG
The glow pulses.
Not like a hazard.
Like a heartbeat.
